subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Thomas Jones provided the Jets with ball control on Sunday and finished with 25 carries for 110 yards, his first 100-yard rushing game as a Jet and his 17th in the N.F.L.
snippet: Thomas Jones provided the Jets with ball control on Sunday and finished with 25 carries for 110 yards, his first 100-yard rushing game as a Jet and his 17th in the N.F.L.
